title: Improving Multi-step RAG with Hypergraph-based Memory for Long-Context Complex Relational Modeling
summary: Multi-step retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) has become a widely adopted strategy for enhancing large language models (LLMs) on tasks that demand global comprehension and intensive reasoning. Many RAG systems incorporate a working memory module to consolidate retrieved information.
